steps.question: Was the deceased/testator married?
steps.legal_sources: 3 kap. 1 § ÄB & e contrario 2 kap. 1-3 §§ ÄB 5 kap. 1 § ÄB

steps.question: Was there a pending divorce case at the time of the deceased’s/testator’s death?

steps.outcome: The spouse’s inheritance right will be affected by the will, but the spouse has a right to at least 4 price base amounts.
steps.legal_sources: 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, 3 kap. 1 § 2 st. ÄB

steps.question: Does the deceased/testator have any surviving children?
What type of descendants are there?
Have they waived their inheritance rights in favour of the surviving spouse?

steps.outcome: The spouse will inherit apart from the inheritance share which the children from another relationship will receive immediately.
steps.legal_sources: 3 kap. 1 § 1 st. 2 m. ÄB, 3 kap. 9 § ÄB é contrario, 3 kap. 2 § ÄB

steps.question: Have the children from another relationship waived their inheritance rights?

steps.outcome: The legal order of inheritance, alternatively will apply.
steps.legal_sources: 3 kap. 1 § ÄB & e contrario 2 kap. 1-3 §§ ÄB 5 kap. 1 § ÄB

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits the shared children's statutory share with free disposal rights. Children from another relationship receive their inheritance immediately.
steps.legal_sources: 3 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, 3 kap. 9 § ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 2

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits with free disposal rights, and the children have a right to subsequent inheritance.
The spouse inherits with free disposal rights as the children have a right to subsequent inheritance.
The spouse inherits with free disposal rights as the children have a right to subsequent inheritance.
steps.legal_sources: 3 kap. 9 § ÄB, 3 kap. 2 § 1 st. 2 m. ÄB

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits with full ownership.
As you were not married to the deceased nor mentioned in a will, you have no inheritance right. However, you are entitled to 2 price base amounts.
steps.legal_sources: 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 3 kap. 1 § e contrario, 18 § 2 st. SamboL

steps.question: Is there a will in which the testator has mentioned you as a beneficiary?
Were you still in a relationship when the deceased died?
Does the testator have any surviving children?

steps.outcome: The will is not valid anymore. Hence, you have no inheritance right.

steps.question: Have any of the children contested the will?

steps.outcome: The cohabitant inherits any assets designated to them as stipulated in the will.
The cohabitant inherits according to the will apart from the statutory share of the inheritance, which the children have a right to receive.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 1 and 3 §§ ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 85

steps.outcome: The children receive their statutory share as a subsequent inheritance, meaning the spouse inherits the rest according to the will.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 85

steps.question: Is the will directed to the spouse?

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits apart from the statutory share, which the children will receive immediately.
The spouse inherits according to the will.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § 1 and 3 st. ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 85

steps.question: Does the deceased have any surviving parents or siblings?

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits with free disposal right.
steps.legal_sources: 3 kap. 1 § 1 st. 1 m. ÄB, 3 kap. 2 § 1 st. ÄB, SOU 1998:110 s. 83

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits according to the will.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § 1 and 3 st. ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 85

steps.question: Have the children from another relationship waived their inheritance rights in favor of the surviving spouse?

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits the entire inheritance with free disposal rights, as the shared children and children from another relationship will both inherit subsequently.
steps.legal_sources: 3 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, 3 kap. 9 § ÄB, 3 kap. 2 § 1 st. 2 m. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 2

steps.outcome: The spouse does not inherit the inheritance share of children from another relationship, as the children are entitled to their share immediately. The spouse inherits the shared children's share with free disposal rights, as they have a right to subsequent inheritance.
steps.legal_sources: 3 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, 3 kap. 2 § 1 st. 2 m. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 2

steps.question: Have the children contested the will?

steps.outcome: The children receive their statutory share as a subsequent inheritance, meaning the spouse inherits the rest according to the will.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 85

steps.outcome: The spouse inherits according to the will.
steps.legal_sources: 7 kap. 3 § ÄB, 9 kap. 1 § ÄB, 11 kap. 1 § 1 st. ÄB, Prop. 1986/87:1 s. 85

steps.question: Is the will directed to the cohabitant?

steps.outcome: The cohabitant inherits according to the will, unless contested by the children.
As the cohabitant was not included in the will, no inheritance rights are given.

steps.question: Have any of the children contested the will?

steps.outcome: The children receive their statutory share, while the cohabitant inherits the rest according to the will.
The cohabitant inherits according to the will.
